full_text: Page 506 I/M Epstein #76318-054 From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) NYM/Lieutenants Date 2019/07/23 22:17 Subject: I/M Epstein #76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm The purpose of this email is to inquire as to whether or not inmate Epstein, Jeffrey #76318-054 is mentally capable of proceeding with the disciplinary process. Thanks in advance. Page 1408 DOJ-OGR-00024963

text_blocks.content: I/M Epstein #76318-054 From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) NYM/Lieutenants Date 2019/07/23 22:17 Subject: I/M Epstein #76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm The purpose of this email is to inquire as to whether or not inmate Epstein, Jeffrey #76318-054 is mentally capable of proceeding with the disciplinary process. Thanks in advance.

additional_notes: The document is an email regarding the mental capability of inmate Jeffrey Epstein to proceed with a disciplinary process. Some information is redacted, marked as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C).
